Articles.Content:
Since 1.0 I've been unable to get any contracts, other than the starting orbit kerbin, to explore, orbit, land, plant flag, contracts. Since 1.0.4 I haven't gotten any contracts other than orbit a satalite, recover, rescue, and mine.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-26T12:26:26Z" title="06/26/2015 12:26  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 26, 2015</time> by locustgate**
Same here, but only since upgrading from 1.0.2 to 1.0.4.
